arts.ttl: Dortmund believe in Champions League push after Hoffenheim win
arts.sum: Emre Can and Sebastian Kehl voiced their confidence in securing Champions League qualification following Borussia Dortmund’s dramatic 3-2 victory over Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: Ilzer slams "scandalous" refereeing decision after Hoffenheim's loss to Dortmund
arts.sum: TSG Hoffenheim coach Christian Ilzer blasted the officiating as “scandalous” after Oliver Baumann was denied a free-kick prior to Borussia Dortmund’s decisive goal.

arts.ttl: Dortmund clinch thrilling victory with last-gasp Waldemar Anton winner against Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Serhou Guirassy celebrates his opening goal for Borussia Dortmund - his tenth in the second half of the season. Borussia Dortmund won a rollercoaster encounter in Hoffenheim as Waldemar Anton struck the decisive blow deep into stoppage time.

arts.ttl: TSG Hoffenheim vs. Borussia Dortmund preview: BVB aim to bolster European chances
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund are looking to significantly bolster their chances of European football with an away win against Hoffenheim this weekend.

arts.ttl: Kovac gives update on Dortmund squad ahead of Hoffenheim trip
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund coach Niko Kovac has provided an update on his squad ahead of Saturday's Bundesliga clash with Hoffenheim.
